article_node.title: Joe Biden seen smiling in photos with daughter Ashley — as debunked Internet rumors swirl about Trump’s health
article_node.summary: Former President Joe Biden was photographed walking with his daughter Ashley, the first public appearance since his May 18 diagnosis of aggressive prostate cancer that has spread to his bones. Amid rumors that former President Donald Trump had died, photos surfaced of Trump with his granddaughter and a post on Truth Social defending his tariff agenda after a court ruling. The article also briefly covers unrelated news such as a Powerball jackpot, a tennis incident, and a bear attack in Alaska.
